name: Hare Plus
description: Hare is a new decentralized and community-centered cryptocurrency. Planned to launched in June 2021 and its goal is to become one of the fastest-growing cryptocurrencies in the world. Hare is one of the pioneer blockchain platform integrating independent research & development and incubation. Our products include Hare Wallet, Hare Chat, Hare Swap, Hare NFT, Hare Farms, Hare Gamefi.
